name: focushub-backend
description: Welcome to the backend for **TimeTrackr**, a gamified time-tracking application inspired by indiaction.club. This monolith powers features like time tracking, activity overviews, badge awards, timelines, project management (public/private), leaderboards, and user profiles. Built for rapid development, it integrates seamlessly with a **React + Vite** frontend, using **Express** for simplicity and familiarity.
